mapper.insert: insert into notice_tbl(ntc_title, ntc_content, adm_id) values (#{ntc_title}, #{ntc_content}, #{adm_id})
mapper.select: select ntc_bno, ntc_title, ntc_content, adm_id, ntc_regdate, ntc_updatedate, ntc_viewcount from notice_tbl order by ntc_bno desc limit 10
select ntc_bno, ntc_title, ntc_content, adm_id, ntc_regdate, ntc_updatedate, ntc_viewcount from notice_tbl where ntc_bno = #{ntc_bno}
